item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, November 13, 2024 at 7:10 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Show HN: Konga Beat – A custom track editor for Donkey Konga 2 and 3 (43 points | 11 comments)
2. Covering the Supreme Court and the Judiciary in (Mostly) Plain English (45 points | 33 comments)
3. MIT engineers make converting CO2 into useful products more practical (100 points | 87 comments)

14. Cornish monument is 4k years older than was thought and 'without parallel' (24 points | 3 comments)

21. How we built the Black Friday Cyber Monday 2023 globe (36 points | 2 comments)
22. New elliptic curve breaks 18-year-old record (16 points | discuss)
23. Way too many ways to wait on a child process with a timeout (54 points | 15 comments)

28. The Art of Manually Editing Hunks (14 points | 7 comments)
29. The number given as % CPU in Activity Monitor (74 points | 13 comments)
30. Bypassing regulatory locks, hacking AirPods and Faraday cages (544 points | 168 comments)
